question: Which ocean houses the "Wandel Sea"?
explanation: Wandel Sea, also known as Mc Kinley Sea, is located in the Arctic Ocean. It stretches from Greenland Island of Denmark to Svalbard of Norway. It is blocked by ice almost all of the year. Cape Morris Jesup marks the limit between the Lincoln Sea to the west and Wandel Sea to the east. The Wandel Sea connects to the Greenland Sea through the Fram Strait.
